review: These two little gems work great in my motor home. I cast movies etc from my phone, to watch in the bedroom and living room!

review: Seems to work pretty well, when it does work.I have a lot of trouble syncing and connecting to it through my iOS device.  That might have something to do with my home network though.

review: It makes my reg tv a smart tv

review: Great little piece of hardware. I bought this for my parents hoping it would be easy for a couple of old folks to use to stream Netflix, YouTube, etc to their tv. It works like a charm and they had no trouble figuring out a lot of its functionality.
author: Austin

review: great product for your TV network
